o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_IsLiteralValue
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript:
Function %Get%(obj) %Get% = False
'Get the Mapped To value. Dim strMappedTo : strMappedTo = obj.MappedTo
' We can only derive the source attribute if the mapped to is set. If Len(strMappedTo) > 0 Then ' If the source feature is empty, the source is probably a static value. If (obj.SourceFeature Is Nothing) Then ' If the mapped to value is a numeric value or encapsulated in single quotes, it's a static value. If IsLiteralValue(strMappedTo) Then %Get% = True End If End If End If End Function
